LanguageData.SelectImplanterPresetDesc: Select bionix automator preset from the list.
LanguageData.AutoImplanterProcessStarted: Can't switch preset when the bionix automator is started.
LanguageData.AutoImplanterStartDesc: Once the {0} is filled with the required ingredients, {1}, select a colonist and right-click on the {0} or on a downed person to start the scanner.
LanguageData.CommandCancelAutoImplanterDesc: Cancel the automator process. The contained person will be killed and ejected.
LanguageData.ConfirmCancelAutoImplanter: Cancelling the process will kill {PAWN_nameDef}.\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.ConfirmAutoImplantation: Initiating the process will kill the pawn if cancelled early or the power is cut. If the patient already has bionics installed on the bodypart they will be destroyed during the process.\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.AutoImplanterDeletePresetConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {0}?
LanguageData.AutoImplanterSettingsSurgerySpeedModifie: Surgery Speed Modifier(70 % means the surgery takes 70 % of original time)
LanguageData.AutoImplanterDeath: No power has caused {0} to die.
LanguageData.BionixAutoRefillDesc: Restart bionix automatically after finishing operation.
